alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Furnas; Gosper; Greeley; Phelps; Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 07 at 2:52PM CDT until September 08 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...DANGEROUS FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS POSSIBLE THURSDAY... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM CDT THURSDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR VALLEY, GREELEY, SHERMAN, DAWSON, BUFFALO, GOSPER, PHELPS AND FURNAS COUNTIES... The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 11 AM to 8 PM CDT Thursday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * WINDS...From the south, sustained 15 to 25 MPH and gusting as high as 30 to 35 MPH. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 to 25 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly and exhibit extreme fire behavior. Use extreme caution if engaging in activities that could result in fire ignition.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Buffalo; Dawson; Furnas; Gosper; Greeley; Phelps; Sherman; Valley
